snippet.title: The Violets of Amicus™ Official Demo Trailer (Kickstarter 2025)
snippet.description:
Creation Mode Studios™ is excited to bring you The Violets of Amicus™, a 2D, semi open-world action-adventure game inspired by The Legend of Zelda series.

In the land of Velare, a young courier becomes a soldier and sets out to rid the countryside of the ferocious Violets. With mysterious dungeons and roaming monsters, Asteric must hone his combat skills, gather weapons, discover special items, and unravel what is happening in the Ancient Gardens.

Our Kickstarter Pre-Launch is now live! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/creationmodestudios/the-violets-of-amicus

Wishlist the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2982750/The_Violets_of_Amicus_Demo/

Wishlist the official game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2982700/The_Violets_of_Amicus/

https://linktr.ee/thevioletsofamicus

Follow us on social media: 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thevioletsofamicus/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thevioletsofamicus/
X: https://x.com/violetsofamicus
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thevioletsofamicus
